mapper.select: select t.updateuser,t.updatetime,t.createuser,t.createtime,t.state,t.sizes,t.ext,t.path,t.name,t.base_document_id,t.src_id,t.md5key from T_BASE_DOCUMENT t order by t.updatetime desc
select t.updateuser,t.updatetime,t.createuser,t.createtime,t.state,t.sizes,t.ext,t.path,t.name,t.base_document_id,t.md5key from T_BASE_DOCUMENT t where base_document_id = #{base_document_id}
mapper.update: update T_BASE_DOCUMENT set updateuser = #{updateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIME}, createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIME}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sizes = #{sizes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ext = #{ext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, src_id = #{src_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, md5key = #{md5key,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where base_document_id = #{base_document_id}
mapper.select: select t.sizes,t.ext,t.name,t.base_document_id,src_id,md5key from T_BASE_DOCUMENT t where src_id = #{src_id}
